website_summaries.verdict: A solid steamer pot set made of stainless steel with a see-through tempered glass lid.
pros: Made of stainless steel with a detachable handle and an aluminum core that retains and conducts heat well
It is easy to clean and dishwasher safe
cons: The tempered glass lid can get broken with light use
No indication of maximum temperature it can withstand

customer_reviews.title: Always look like new with care
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set for a small family. I use mine to do just about everything I don't want water logged and mushy. I steam baby carrots until fork tender and love whole red potatoes likewise. I steam frozen tamales and love artichokes steamed till the leafs pull off easily too. Though it says you can put in an oven I tend to think this would eventually deteriorate the handles and besides, Why? Dishwasher safe thought I simply swish in hot soapy water and rinse and drain. P.S. Just remember to use on the right size of your stove burner if you have a glass top stove on med/low heat. Any pan is only as good as the care we give them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my steamer. I used it as soon as I could get it out of the box. After reading the description I was confident that it was high-quality stainless steel which was a must. "Another pleasant surprise is that it is lightweight and easy to use. I wasn't sure about the handles on both sides of the pot but find they actually help with handling. The steamer is roomy and much better than the steamer basket I once used to insert in my pot. I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase. By the way, the pot was available at another store for just about the same price without the steamer. Thank you for a well-designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for steaming, I use it regularly.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times a week for either steaming vegetables or fish and it has worked very well. It looks great and does the job well so I highly recommend this set. Just remember to not set the heat too high to avoid discoloration of the bottom. I also did wait for the price to drop so I was even happier with the purchase, remember that most Amazon item prices tend to fluctuate.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen Tennis Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to eat healthier and I decided to buy this stack and steamer set. It's super easy to use and easy to clean. I like that I can throw some veggies in there and walk away for a while as they steam. If you keep the heat on medium (gas burners) as it states in the instructions, you should have no issues with the handles getting hot. Overall I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A. Chastain

customer_reviews.title: safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is shiny, looks good, like the weight-feel. I think it was cooking on the burner for about 10 mins before I realized that I had forgotten to put water in it. This steamer is made so well that it distributed the heat even after I forgot, first time, to add water before turning on the heat, without burning red or catching fire. I contacted Chef's Star to see if the steamer was still safe to use. He said yes, and advised to purchase Bar Keepers Friend from Amazon to help clean up the discoloration. I highly recommend this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Antol

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. The set is shiny and beautiful. I've used the pans a few times and washed them in the dishwasher. They came out of the dishwasher looking spotless. This is a metal that can also be used on an induction stove which is a big plus for me. I have received many new products recently that did not turn out to my expectations at all. I believe that this is one time my expectations have been met. I expect this pan set will last a long time and I'm glad I bought this set. However, one problem is the handles. They do get hot, just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Sturdy and attractive. I needed a steamer and a 3 quart pot so this seemed a good choice. Had it about 1 1/2 weeks and used it 4-5 times. So far, it has cleaned easily and shows no wear.
customer_reviews.author: Goos

customer_reviews.title: Quality steamer
customer_reviews.text: I liked this three piece steamer so well, I ended up buying another one. It has enough holes that water does not accumulate around the steamed vegetables and it is wide enough for steaming a large quantity of veggies. I had an aluminum steamer before and it is really nice to have a stainless steel steamer, better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Friscochase

customer_reviews.title: Just received today
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and delivered. Pan appears unflawed. It is a nice appearing set. I have washed it but not used it yet. It is somewhat lighter in weight than I anticipated. It does not have rolled Rim on pot and steamer, as my other cookware has. Do not know if that will function differently. Anxious to use this as steamer and see how it performs. Three star until I actually give it a spin on my induction burner.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This steamer unit is perfect for me. The pan surface cleans easily with soap and does not require a polishing material. The upper basket nesta perfectly into the lower pan and is very stable. The glass lid allows you to view the food but slides off the steamer basket easily. The lid also makes popping noise as is is heating and cooling. In spite of these quirks I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: VintageRacer

customer_reviews.title: Glass lid exploded!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 3 years. Were just steaming some veggies for dinner and the glass lid exploded. Sprayed little glass fragments all over the stove, but was fortunately otherwise contained since it's tempered glass. Shattered like a windshield!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, perfect size, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, better than expected,high quality, perfect for steaming everything ! Works with steamer insert or without.Very good heat transfer, very good fit of all pieces. Buy this steamer you will not regret it. Very,Very satified.
customer_reviews.author: S Adlerz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use set, just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, I finally bought this instead of that steamer thing with the holes that always needed to fit in any pot I had. I steam veggies every day now, and need a good one. This is perfect. I liked the handles that don’t get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect steamed veggies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect steamed veggies! I would always order this mixed veggie side at a local restaurant, but could never get my broccoli, carrots, squash, etc to taste as good at home. Someone told me to steam them instead of boil so I bought this & voila! Now I eat a lot more veggies & it's because they actually taste good!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality great size
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is a great small size and works really well. I would have given 5 stars however the first few times I used the steamer my whole kitchen smelled of burining plastic, I realized the heat from my gas stove was heating up the plastic handles and releasing a plastic smell, really unpleasant and prob shouldn’t happen on a pot meant for a stove top. When I turn the heat to medium low the smell doesn’t happen. Beware using this on high heat on a gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real nice pan to steam with, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Hold a good amount of vegetables works very well, I use almost every night to steam veggies. Not to big not to small, uses larger size burner on an electric range, easy to clean and I like glass lid with little vent in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W. PA

customer_reviews.title: Love this pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot, it’s my favorite. It is still shiny, as the day it came in. I make my potato’s in this pot, as I like them steamed. Just a great pot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana Mancero

customer_reviews.title: Good size & quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and is of a good size and quality. I cook only for myself so it is probably bigger than I need. I've never steamed veggies before and added too much water which was bubbling into the top rack slightly. I also should have let the cauliflower & broccoli steam for a little longer as they were a bit crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Basket too low in pan,
customer_reviews.text: I plan to return this steamer as the steamer part sits too low in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I searched many products for a steamer. I decided to get the Chef’s Star 3 piece steamer. It is a bit smaller than I thought, but I truly love it!!! It is all that the product description says. Washes up beautifully. I used the same day I received to steam some sweet potatoes which cane out perfect. Great product and company. I highly recommend it for a medium sized steamer. Love the stainless!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Tapken

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the lip is very sharp while cleaning and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the lip is very sharp while cleaning and the part that holds the water gets water spots super easy. But it doesn't leak or sprits water out the top or sides works like a champ just ugly after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: DHurtado

customer_reviews.title: I like this steamer pot
customer_reviews.text: It seems solid, well made and has enough space for a lot of vegetables to steam.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

customer_reviews.title: Super useful and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Super useful and convenient, perfect size. I never heard anything from this brand and I was a little skeptical but the overall quality is good. I highly recommended, I been cooking all my baby food on it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Nunez Casado

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for me and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for me and works great. I can steam small amounts of food for one person but it also can hold enough for all three of us. It cleans up nicely and is a good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: It works well but note that if you do long time steam....
customer_reviews.text: It works well but note that if steam things for a long time(i.e. 45min+) the handles will generate some plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Janeamythen

customer_reviews.title: Double check inner dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Description on web sight was not accurate. Needed to send back for return. Quality seemed very good, but size did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lab Lover

customer_reviews.title: Such a Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buys for our household. We use this pan frequently and it is always up to the task. We like the styling and, so far, after several months of use it has kept its shine so it looks good sitting on the range top.
customer_reviews.author: Suntime

customer_reviews.title: Rub handle get roasted
customer_reviews.text: This product has design flaws, it's relatively small so the rub handles are exposed to flames when placed on stove. Steaming for 5 mins and my room is full of smell of roasted rub, useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my glass-top stove.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Perfectly flat bottom does not wobble on my glass-top stove, as some other pans did. Especially like the short side handles.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My family is really enjoying this piece of cookware. It steams the vegetables perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size I had a very old one that was small The pots are a little thin but do the job
customer_reviews.author: Pc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time since I steam my veggies. It works well for warming up left-overs too
customer_reviews.author: Jehu Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This pot is just the perfect size and the real plus is that it is dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice steamer
customer_reviews.text: Decent steamer. It’s made in China. But surprisingly nice. Great to steam veggies in. Didn’t take long. Light weight stainless steel. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a real stainless steel I am using it in my induction.
customer_reviews.author: ula

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: We received the order in three days, and used that very day. I like the large handles on each side which makes it easier to work with when a person has arthritic hands. We will have these pots for many years and will use almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I do veggies and fruits in it to make baby food! Also use for dinner items!
customer_reviews.author: TammyEliza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and the taste of the food.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend .
customer_reviews.text: Don't really like it! Too small not very nice quality !
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Useful steamer
customer_reviews.text: It is the right size and works on my induction cooktopo
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great pot for steaming! Handles do not get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Madisonsgramma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and excellent stainless steel, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect size for steaming vegetables. I also put leftover turkey in it and steam it. So moist! Best and easiest steamer I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Love steamed veggies
customer_reviews.text: Great product for steaming veggies. Easy to use and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: J.Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Steaming Set!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. Use it frequently, convenient size, nice quality, easy to clean, a real pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and works well as steamer or sauce pot
customer_reviews.author: Charles Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steal steamer
customer_reviews.text: Really good pieces. I used to steam my baby's food. It leaves water marks after air dry
customer_reviews.author: estrada medarda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice steamer. Perfect size. Tried it and it steams vegetables perfectly. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Galvin

customer_reviews.title: It's well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! I use this to steam veggies and fish. I've always trusted the name Chef Star
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Shkrutz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Steam leaks from the side. I can only use the steam tray for straining.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This serves my purpose very well. abut for some people it might not be large enough. Doesn't hold a huge volume. Feels sturdy and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received in excellent condition . Love this Stainless Steel set!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Perfect steamer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, it was the perfect size, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, evenly flows heat on bottom pan, top steamer pan large enough for multiple veggies. Very pleased with product!
customer_reviews.author: SB FH, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and love the fact the handles do not get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nelda R.

customer_reviews.title: great for 1 or 2 people with 8/10 oz
customer_reviews.text: great for 1 or 2 people with 8/10 oz pasta
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality steamer
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing, great steamer dose the job very well and it’s durable I ordered a second one two days later it’s just great quality , nice addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nour

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. No problems at all so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift to me Mom. She loved it. No problems at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: JC Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Steamer pot
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just what I needed & expected. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Inniss

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. This is a nice size pot for about 3 servings
customer_reviews.author: OLShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pot. I used it over and over. And still performs
customer_reviews.author: Rusher

customer_reviews.title: it worked beautifully for what we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present, and the first time I washed it, a small measuring cup landed on top of it and shattered the top. I hope I can find a replacement, it worked beautifully for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality..i didn't have the chance to return it just because I’m too busy.. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jerny18

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, plenty of room, high quality stainless steel! Great Steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pot to steam veggies. There are plenty of room, both the diameter and the depth are very well designed! The quality of stainless steel is decent. It is not the super heavy duty kind, but definitely good enough. Since it's not too heavy, it's also very easy to hand wash and clean. I use it everyday and am in love with it!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: boolpp

customer_reviews.title: Found a MUCH better one at Home Goods and at a very lower ...
customer_reviews.text: Very thin metal, stains after the very first use, smells as cheep steal which is going to rust if left wet for some time. I am not going to use it. Found a MUCH better one at Home Goods and at a very lower price. Have no idea why all reviews are so positive.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Lozovatskaya

customer_reviews.title: I love this pot it is bigger then the one it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot it is bigger then the one it was replacing and because of that it serves my kitchen needs much better. I am definitely considering purchasing another one. Its multi purpose and who doesn't love that?
customer_reviews.author: irelyngirl22

customer_reviews.title: Problem with lower handles - but great customer service took care of it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this steamer almost daily for the last five months. I was very happy with it until I noticed one of the lower handles was loose. Then I noticed the bottom of both lower handles was gradually disappearing, apparently from the heat from the gas burner. Others have said they smelled burning plastic, and I am not surprised. Except for this major, and possibly dangerous, design flaw, this is a great steamer. I contacted customer service and they took care of the problem to my satisfaction! The moral here is to make sure the flames from a gas burner do not go up the sides of the lower pot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with what I received
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with what I received. 1. One of the handle is broken even it’s still in the package 2. This steamer is way too small as what I thought. Can’t even steam a piece of whole fish. Have to return it. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Fang Wang

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Just know that the top portion ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Just know that the top portion sits about half way into the bottom section so you can't fill up too much water otherwise it will go into your steamed item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spotty product.
customer_reviews.text: Used product twice on medium heat. Multiple spots are all over the inside bottom of the saucepot. Not so stainless steel. Returning item. Planning to spend more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Less TV and Read More

customer_reviews.title: I love the size (downsized from my 4 quart pot/steamer that ...
customer_reviews.text: Chef Star's 3 piece 2 quart stainless pot with steamer is all I expected and more. I love the size (downsized from my 4 quart pot/steamer that failed after 15 years of virtually daily use) and I love the handles - they are well sized and position for easy use as well as cool to the touch when the pot is in full boil. Pot is well made and has a nice finish. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a steamer that would be a step up from the cheap collapsible stainless steel jobs that fit inside a pot - and never last long. I didn't want to spend $50 on a top brand, and this Chef's Star item seemed a good compromise. So far, it works very well, and seems to be solidly made. It is not heavy-duty, but does the job as intended.
customer_reviews.author: MBR

customer_reviews.title: So far so good it works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I just got this pan & used few times. So far so good it works GREAT! I previously purchased a cook wear set of this brand which is good also. My only complaint is they're rather low quality & thin pans so you MUST watch when using or put on LOW temperature. My next set will be thicker, more durable, higher quality. However this brand has great value for the economic price. Overall a good buy. I love steaming veggies so definitely a must have pan!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Barry

customer_reviews.title: also easy to clean - I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this little gem several months ago and use it daily. Well constructed and designed, also easy to clean - I highly recommend it. To the people who've said too much steam comes out between the pots, that is because once the water boils you must turn the heat to low. if the pots fit more tightly it would build up too muich pressure. Also, if you leave it boiling you risk boiling it dry and scorching the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V.

customer_reviews.title: Steamer and Sauce Pot
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far and it did as I expected. Steamed a whole large cauliflower in it and it wasn't completely full. Big handles are handy. You have to be pretty clutsy to burn yourself. I liked being able to easily check if it was running dry.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted and have been looking for this size for a while. Most other pots where so big. This product quality is top notch and it is not too heavy to handle. We love seafood, especially shrimp and this is ideal for what we make. The product got here in record time and we could not be more pleased. 6 stars to Chef's Star!
customer_reviews.author: Singer60

customer_reviews.title: Great set for boiling and using to melt ingredients when cooking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to melt chocolate when I make chocolate mousse cake. Love this set as you can fill up the bottom pan with water, boil the water, and then rest another pan/bowl in the top pan in order to melt chocolate and other ingredients without burning your pans. You can also use this set to steam vegetables. Great and love it!
customer_reviews.author: katespadecase

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STEAMING POT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR STEAMING VEGETABLES, VERY EASY TO CLEAN, GREAT HANDLES' YOU'LL NEVER BURN YOUR FINGERS ON THIS POT, HANDLES STAY COOL THROUGHOUT COOKING .... BEST STEAMER PERIOD
customer_reviews.author: IMABAJIM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for two people. I have used it to steam vegetables over a pot of water, as well as steaming while using the bottom to cook pasta at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Harvell

customer_reviews.title: Good size for two.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer pot in February. Love it. Perfect size for two and I use it for more than steaming. The only problem I have with it is I can't seem to get rid of some spots on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rootygabooty

customer_reviews.title: Double Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set of stainless steel set! It is so convenient and the perfect size! We've steamed fresh green beans, bologna rings, carrots, well you name it, we've probably done it! Being stainless steel is awesome cause it stays so nice and the outside stays shiny! We've even used just the kettle for boiling things. I won't part with this for anything and would even like to have another one! You won't regret buying this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Debroux

customer_reviews.title: chunky handles
customer_reviews.text: I almost did not order this because of the huge chunky handles, but the pan is well made and the handles are not too big to be of use. Nice size pot, in between a saucepan and that huge pot that comes with sets.
customer_reviews.author: happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: The Steamer is Large
customer_reviews.text: I love the large steamer. It is at least 2 times the size of my old one. Just what I was hoping for when I bought it. I steam all of my vegetables so it is used constantly. So happy with it. The double boiler that my old steamer has also fist my new one. That is double nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Sted

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is nice but the description is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice but the description is incorrect. This is described as a 2 quart steamer and 3 quart pot, which is just what I wanted. But it is in fact a 3 quart steamer and a 4 quart pot. My current 3 quart pot fits inside this one with plenty of room to spare. I returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Too much gap between the layers
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time steaming rice without putting a napkin between the layers to prevent it from steaming out from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Angela X

customer_reviews.title: I love my new steam pot
customer_reviews.text: I love my new steam pot. It's large enough to steam a whole head of cauliflower or several different vegetables at once. Also very easy to clean, much easier than my old collapsible basket type. If I could offer any improvement it would be to roll the edges of the two pots so as to not have as sharp of an edge. It will not cut you, but feels like it might. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great value and I love the glass lid
customer_reviews.text: Great value and I love the glass lid. I don't have to take it off like the one it replaced to see how the cooking is going. And you don't need glove to lift off the lid or the steam tray.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer plus alot more.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything well.Use with or without steamer insert. The steamer has a large capacity. The handels stay cool when in stove top use. Heavy bottom keeps food from scorching. I normally spend much more on pots and pans but I may have to rethink that.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brockman

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I just wish the handles weren't so ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I just wish the handles weren't so large. Take up lots of space in the storage unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product. It was given as a gift for my son's birthday and he really liked it. Please send the free lemon squeezer to the following address: Keith Lewis 684 Cedar Grove Road Winchester, Virginia 22603 Thank you for the gift. Sincerely, Janette Lewis
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Handles smell like burning
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this steamer but the handles smell like melting plastic when it’s used. The smell is so strong it’s nauseating
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the folding steam baskets!
customer_reviews.text: Does what I want it to do but left a little water stain in bottom pot after first use. Doesn't affect usability.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Cote

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is a great serving size for three people.
customer_reviews.author: constant traveler

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part is sturdy and large enough to use as a saucepan for lots of stuff. The colander part is also large which allows you to put more in or just spread out a smaller load so it steams more quickly. The glass top is nice as you can see what is going on inside. It is perfect for my blanching needs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer-this steams vegetables better than any steamer I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Biroschak

customer_reviews.title: steamer
customer_reviews.text: A great steamer. Easy to use and wash. So far have steamed spinach and summer squash and it did a great job. Really like the big handles which stay cool during steaming.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steamer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I never could find this at the store, stores only carry the rubber steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it isn't what I thought I was ordering. My bad. It appears to be a nice steamer basket. It will make a nice gift to my sweet daughter. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca of SunnyBrook

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You can tell it's quality cookware at a fantastic price. We use it to cook our dinner every night.
customer_reviews.author: NA Costa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, not too small. Easy to clean, and lightweight. Regarding "wear and tear", nothing I can say yet. Let's hope this do last.
customer_reviews.author: marc tuason

customer_reviews.title: First class product!!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, nice size, quality product... just got it, but I love it already!! Keep all the goodness in those veggies by steaming instead of boiling, where the goodness goes down the sink drain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana LouLou

product_meta.title: Chef's Star 3 Piece Stainless Steel Stack and Steam Pot Set - 2 Quart Steamer and 3 Quart Saucepot Set with Lid and Pots
product_meta.description:
Have a big meal coming up that you need to prep for?
How about just a normal everyday dinner for your family?
Looking to boil, heat, steam, or simmer a variety of foods? 

Look no further than the Chef's Star 3 Piece Stainless Steel Stack and Steam Set. It's all you need to put together a masterpiece of a meal. 

Features: 

- High quality heavy duty 18/10 stainless steel polished to a mirror finish
- Comes with a 2 quart steamer with handles, 3 quart saucepan (4.5" deep) with handles, and domed lid
- Self basting lid helps to seal in heat and moisture - Aluminum core in base of pot to heat evenly
- Bottom of the pot resists corrosion and discoloring
- Rolled pot rim to prevent dripping
- Oven safe to 350 degrees Fahrenheit
- Saucepan and Steamer are dishwasher safe 

Lifetime Warranty: 

Buy with confidence! Chef's Star offers a lifetime warranty on your purchase that protects against product defects.
feature_bullets: High quality heavy duty 18/10 stainless steel gives the set a beautiful appearance | The aluminum core in the pot's base is heat evenly and the base capped by stainless steel
2-quart steamer fits directly inside 3-quart saucepot and comes with a tight fitting lid
Rolled pot rim is ideal for drip resistant pouring
